posts.post_title: FT: T206 Schulte Back View SGC 50 and T206 Burch Fielding PSA 4
posts.post_content:
The Schulte is a SC 350-460 Overprint and the Burch is a Polar Bear.
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/SchulteBack1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/scan0010.jpg[/IMG]

I am looking for well centered T206 SGC 50 for my registry.  Below is a link.  I can also throw in some case if your trade bait is valued higher.  

Thanks!
